scripts.test: npm run test:webpack & npm run test:scss & npm run test:android
scripts.test:android: npm run build:android & chokidar 'www/**/*' -c 'npm run build:android'
scripts.build: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:scss && npm run build:android
scripts.flash: npx webpack && sass --no-source-map src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && sh flash.sh && echo Finished
scripts.multiflash: npx webpack && sass --no-source-map src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && sh flash.sh --multi && echo Finished
